Address.label: Address
Address.value: 3 WEST PACES FERRY ROAD,SUITE 200, ATLANTA, Georgia, 30305, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Repay Holdings Corp is engaged in providing integrated payment processing solutions to verticals that have transaction processing needs. It allows customers to pay through Mobile App, Text, Interactive Voice Response, Virtual Terminal, Hosted Payment Page and Online Customer Portal among others. It operates in one segment, Merchant services.
